topic: Getting to Know Active and Passive Voice

definitions.title: Active Voice
definitions.definition: In the active voice, the subject of the sentence performs the action.
definitions.example: Example: The teacher explains the lesson.
definitions.explanation: Here, 'the teacher' (subject) is doing the action 'explains'.

definitions.title: Passive Voice
definitions.definition: In the passive voice, the subject of the sentence receives the action.
definitions.example: Example: The lesson is explained by the teacher.
definitions.explanation: The focus shifts from who is doing the action to what is being done.

definitions.title: Subject
definitions.definition: The person or thing that performs or receives the action in a sentence.
definitions.explanation: In active voice, the subject does the action; in passive, it receives it.

definitions.title: Verb
definitions.definition: A word that expresses action or state of being.
definitions.explanation: Verbs show what the subject does or what happens to it.

definitions.title: Direct Object
definitions.definition: The receiver of the action in an active sentence.
definitions.example: Example: 'People need support.' ‚Üí Direct Object: support
definitions.explanation: It answers the question 'What?' or 'Whom?' after the verb.

definitions.title: Active Voice Sentence Pattern
definitions.definition: Follows the pattern Subject + Verb + Direct Object (S-V-DO).
definitions.explanation: Subject (DBM) performs the action (releases) to the object (financial aid).

definitions.title: Passive Voice Sentence Pattern
definitions.definition: Follows the pattern Object + Form of 'be' + Past Participle + by + Subject.
definitions.example: Example: Financial aid is released by DBM.
definitions.explanation: The focus is on the object (financial aid), not on the doer.

definitions.title: Verb Forms in Passive Voice
definitions.definition: Passive voice uses forms of 'be' + past participle.
definitions.explanation: Choose the correct 'be' form based on the tense of the active sentence.

definitions.title: Identifying Passive Voice
definitions.definition: Look for the pattern: form of 'be' + past participle + by...
definitions.example: Example: 'was denied by PNP' or 'is prepared for planting season'
definitions.explanation: These clues show the action is being received, not performed.
